name: ViralHemorrhagicFeverTestsForViralHemorrhagicFeverVirusAntigen
title: Viral Hemorrhagic Fever (Tests for Viral Hemorrhagic Fever Virus Antigen)
description: This value set should only include hemorrhagic conditions caused by the following viruses: Filoviruses: Ebola virus and Marburg virus Old-world arenaviruses: Lassa virus and Lujo virus New- world arenaviruses: Guanarito, Machupo, Junin, and Sabia viruses Crimean Congo hemorrhagic fever viruses.
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Viral Hemorrhagic Fever Antigen),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Viral Hemorrhagic Fever Antigen;  

LOINC Search terms: “(filovirus or ebola or marburg or arenavirus or lassa or lujo or junin or sabia or machupo or guanarito or crimean) Ag -(culture or isolate or panel)”;),(Exclusion Criteria: none)

concept.display: Ebola virus Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Immunofluorescence

Ebola virus Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Immunoassay
